data.title: Online HR Page Layout_Layout 1 - Beloit College
data.meta_description: Online HR Page Layout_Layout 1 - Beloit College
data.text: 2009-2010 Honor Roll of Contributors The following pages contain lists of contributors whose gifts to Beloit College were received during the 2009-2010 fiscal year, June 1, 2009, to May 31, 2010. The college gratefully recognizes each individual contributor and especially acknowledges new donors whose participation, when added to that of loyal Beloit supporters, inspires other donors, grant-makers, and new levels of excellence. The Alumni Giving by class year section beginning on the next page includes only Beloit College alumni names. Alumni who are Beloit parents are also included in the Parents Giving listing beginning on page 22. All other honor roll listings indicate donors who are also Beloit parents with the letter "P" followed by their student's class year(s). Alumni from Graduating Classes of the Last Decade (GOLD) have a special opportunity to become Chapin Society members by contributing $100 for every year since their class graduated. After five years, the gift size remains fixed at $500 until their 10th reunion. 2009-2010 FISCAL YEAR GIVING HIGHLIGHTS $7,808,736 Total gifts and pledges to all funds, including the endowment $2,308,099 Total Beloit Fund unrestricted gifts, representing 4.2 percent of the total budget 40.4% Alumni participation, all funds $580 Average alumni gift, Beloit Fund $685 Average parent gift, Parents Fund $100 Median alumni gift, Beloit Fund $100 Median parent gift, Parents Fund 165 Number of individuals who generated corporate matching gifts $181,006 Total matching gift dollars received $1,097 Average corporate matching gift 14 Number of bequests received, worth a total of $1,314,313 698 Number of Heritage Society members, those who have indicated that Beloit College is in their estate plans through vehicles such as life-income gifts or commitments in their wills 697 Number of Chapin Society members, those who have made a gift of $1,000 or more 125 Number of gifts made in memory of a designated individual 83 Number of gifts made in honor of a designated individual 104 Number of organizations and trusts who made gifts to the college 1,667 Number of phonathon donors, totalling $196,780 in gifts and pledges 197 Number of students from the class of 2010 who made a gift or pledge to their senior class gift effort, totaling more than $18,745 Please note that every effort has been made to achieve a complete and accurate report. In the event of an error, please notify the college’s Office of External Affairs at 800-331-4943 or email gift@beloit.edu. KEY ★ 3 or more consecutive fiscal years of giving n Heritage Society member p deceased
